A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 34 years awaiting Skywalker's return and this is what happens?  I'm sorry but I am disappointed in what I feel is quite a confusing collage of a rehashed storyboard and strange character actions.  Don't you remember the beauty of the story of Star Wars?  Full of political and philosophical undertones packaged in a Science Fiction film?  Please for future pursuit craft story before effects.  Overall disappointed in this film but grateful for episodes 4\, 5\, and 6 where Luke can truly share Star Wars magic with my children as he did with me in my youth.
